name: Neutaconkanut Hill Park Loop
description: One of nine hiking trails available in Neutaconkanut Hill Park, the Park Loop takes visitors through the untouched forests of Providence.

name: Providence River Walk
description: Running along the Providence River, the Providence River Trail offers walkers a scenic view of downtown Providence with the beauty of urban greenspaces and access to Waterplace Park and Riverwalk.

name: Roger Williams Pond Trail
description: Creating a perimeter around four of the lakes located within Williams Park, the Roger Williams Pond Trail is the longest of the trails.

name: Swan Point Cemetery Loop
description: Tracing the perimeter of the beautiful Swan Point Cemetery in downtown Providence, the Perimeter Loop offers a little piece of solitude within nature.

name: Blackstone Park Loop
description: The tree-lined Blackstone Park Loop offers plenty of shade and views of the Seekonk River, waterfalls, and wildlife.

name: Ten Mile River Greenway
description: Following along the Ten Mile River between East Providence and Pawtucket, the Ten Mile River Greenway is a paved asphalt trail that is popular with hikers, runners, and bikers.

name: India Point and Bike Path
description: Circling India Point Park, the paved concrete and stone dust walking trails of the India Point and Bike Path offer views of the Seekonk and Providence Rivers and Providence Harbor.

name: Cliff Walk
description: This is a very popular area for birding, running, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The trail is open year-round and is beautiful to visit anytime.

name: Fort Adams Bay Walk
description: Creating a perimeter around four of the lakes located within Williams Park, the Roger Williams Pond Trail is the longest of the trails.

name: Colonial Tree Walk
description: Visit legendary specimen trees and historic points of interest - courtesy of The Newport Arboretum.

name: Sachuest Beach
description: This route follows the shoreline of Sachuest Beach, also known as Second Beach. Seasonally the beach has lifeguards on duty, as well as bathrooms and a concession stand.

name: Castle Hill Lighthouse
description: This trail is great for walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring. The lighthouse is managed through a partnership between the Castle Hill Inn and the US Coast Guard.
